diagnosis.score_summary: The analysis cannot be performed because the provided input data for both WWW and PDP was null. A comparison requires valid perception data from both channels to detect inconsistencies.

truth_1.headline: Missing Input Data
truth_1.gap_description: The system received null values for both WWW and PDP assessments. No comparison is possible.
truth_1.why_matters: Without data, the engine cannot detect schizophrenia. The brand is currently invisible.
truth_1.the_hard_choice: You are attempting to audit a brand that does not exist in the data stream. You must ensure the previous analysis steps completed successfully (Option A) or manually input the brand perception data (Option B). An empty input yields an empty strategy.

truth_2.headline: The Void Stares Back
truth_2.gap_description: A gap analysis requires two points of reference. We currently have zero.
truth_2.evidence: Comparison logic failed due to null pointers.
truth_2.why_matters: This error indicates a breakage in the workflow upstream.
truth_2.the_hard_choice: You cannot optimize a vacuum. You must either restart the data collection process (Option A) or accept that there is no brand to analyze (Option B). Data is the prerequisite of insight.

truth_3.headline: Total System Silence
truth_3.gap_description: All 17 markers are registering as 'Critical' because no territories were defined.
truth_3.why_matters: Zero alignment usually means total contradiction, but here it means total absence.
truth_3.the_hard_choice: The silence in the data suggests a catastrophic failure in observation. You must choose: fix the input mechanism (Option A) or abandon the audit (Option B). You cannot diagnose a patient who isn't in the room.

truth_4.headline: No Foundation Detected
truth_4.gap_description: There are no safe harbors. Every single attribute is missing.
truth_4.why_matters: Even a chaotic brand has accidental consistency. This result implies the data itself is compromised.
truth_4.the_hard_choice: A brand without a foundation is just noise, or in this case, silence. You need to establish the baseline identity immediately (Option A) or acknowledge this is a clean slate project (Option B). You cannot build on null.

truth_5.headline: Potential Unmeasurable
truth_5.gap_description: No untapped strengths could be calculated because no performance metrics exist.
truth_5.why_matters: Growth comes from leverage. You have no lever.
truth_5.the_hard_choice: Upside requires a baseline. You must define where you are (Option A) before you can decide where to go (Option B). Maps don't work without coordinates.

marker_1.so_what: Input data was null; analysis impossible.
